name: Cervidae
description:
Cervidae

You awaken in an unknown room, cold and alone.

Controls:

Cursor Arrows - Movement
Space - Interact

The team:
Paul Yendley: Game design and artwork
Gareth Williams: Code, code and more code
Carl Hughes: Additional code and sfx foley work
Shaun Reed: Original soundtrack \m/

Unity/C#

Photoshop CC
Audacity
Fruity Loops Studio
